```{r}
library(Matrix)
```

```{r}
#  problem 1
p = c(12,-10,3, -2)
q = c(0,2,8,-8)
s = c(9.62, 12.5,6.52, 10.50)

d = sqrt(p^2 + q^2)

b = d - s
A = cbind(p/d, q/d)

position = solve(t(A)%*%A, t(A)%*%b)
position
```
